Name: Cortex
About the game: Cortex is a little puzzle game containing over 200 levels! To finish a level, simply connect the two points of identical color by drawing the path on the columns! Will you be able to overcome all the levels? Features: ■ More than 200 unique levels! ■ Very relaxing game! ■ Chrono system! ■ Level rating system on 3 stars!
